source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Dustman Bo Zu is appalled─outraged, shocked, appalled─by a shameless display of industriousness and ambition.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_00<tab>Im Abbaugebiet des 789. Ordens kocht Bo Zu vor Wut auf einen anderen Orden.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_01<tab>With a disapproving scowl, Bo Zu relates the recent exploits of the 596th Order, a once<var 1F /var>hapless band of kobolds who are recently climbing the ranks with a most contemptible work ethic. Seek the assistance of 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go, that you might deprive the self<var 1F /var>righteous lot of the fruits of their labor and teach them the important lesson that hard work never pays.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_01<tab>Der 789. Orden liefert sich mit dem 596. Orden ein heißes Rennen um die hinteren Plätze in der Kobold-Hackordnung. Nun versucht der 596. Orden einen Vorsprung zu gewinnen, indem er sein Abbaugebiet erweitert. Frag Ba Go, wie du die dafür nötigen Materialvorräte der Konkurrenz wirkungsvoll zerstören kannst.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_02<tab>The eccentric Ba Go, always eager to be a part of any plot that involves large<var 1F /var>scale death and destruction, furnishes you with a few of his hot<var 1F /var>tempered beauties and some coal to direct them to their targets. In return for his aid, he also demands that you recover at least one of the bomb cores from the resulting rubble after the act of sabotage is done. Head to the 596th's new dig northeast of Camp Overlook and place the coal per the acolyte's instructions.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_02<tab>Ba Go hat dir erklärt, wie du die Materialvorräte des 596. Ordens zerstören kannst. Dafür musst du zunächst <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8969030502 /var> an <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9348030402 /var> nordöstlich von Camp Ausblick anbringen.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_03<tab>You have successfully placed the coal on three small piles of supplies. Leave a wide enough berth, then release Ba Go's beauties to finish the job.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_03<tab>Gut gemacht! Nun benutze <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E896A020502 /var> an <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9351020402 /var>, um die Sprengung durchzuführen.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_04<tab>Ba Go's beauties have performed their task admirably, resulting in a firestorm of destruction of which the mad acolyte would be proud. Search the rubble for one of the bomb cores left over from the explosions.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_04<tab>Hervorragend! Das war eine ordentliche Explosion und die Materialvorräte der Kobolde sind nur noch Schutt und Asche. Doch dein Auftrag ist noch nicht ganz erledigt. Untersuche <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9352030502 /var>, besiege <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20AB7020502 /var> und erbeute seine Essenz!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_05<tab>You have successfully recovered the bomb core. Return to the 789th Order Dig and deliver it to Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_05<tab>Du hast ganze Arbeit geleistet! Bring <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E896B020502 /var> zu Ba Go im Abbaugebiet des 789. Ordens!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_06<tab>Ba Go is pleased, both with the success of his lovingly crafted creations and your ability to recover the core he sought. Eager to return to his work, the acolyte dismisses you abruptly, asking you to report to Bo Zu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_06<tab>Ba Go hat sich sehr über <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E896B020502 /var> gefreut. Daraus will er neue Bomber züchten, zu denen er ein überaus inniges Verhältnis zu haben scheint. Erzähle Bo Zu, dass der 596. Orden keine ernsthafte Konkurrenz mehr darstellt.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_07<tab>Sloth and sluggardy have won the day, and there is much rejoicing from Bo Zu. The 789th must remain wary, however, as one never knows when another rogue kobold order might fall prey to the siren call of gainful effort and exertion. Should such a dark day descend, the dustman would call upon your aid anew...
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_SEQ_07<tab>Bo Zu ist erleichtert, dass der 596. Orden einen herben Rückschlag einstecken musste, sodass der 789. Orden die Oberhand gewinnt, ohne selbst viel dafür getan zu haben. Was würden die kleinen Kerle nur ohne dich machen?

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_00<tab>Speak with 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_01<tab>Set smoldering coals on the 596th Order supplies northeast of Camp Overlook.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_02<tab>Release the smart bombs from a safe location.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_03<tab>Retrieve a bomb core from the embers.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_03<tab><var 2B ((<var 32 ((EObj)) 06F61E9352030502 /var>)) /var> untersuchen, <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20AB7020502 /var> besiegen und seine Essenz erbeuten

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_04<tab>Deliver the core to 789th Order Acolyte Ba Go.
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_05<tab>Report to 789th Order Dustman Bo Zu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_TODO_05<tab>Bo Zu die schadenfrohe Botschaft überbringen

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_000<tab>Those scoundrels─rogues, knaves, scoundrels! This is unforgivable! No, no, it will not be forgiven!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_000<tab>596. Orden unverschämt! Große Un<var 16 /var>verschämt<var 16 /var>heit! Ihr Abbaugebiet sie einfach so erweitern! Bei Camp Ausblick!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_001<tab>For so long─yes, so many moons─did they rival us at the bottom of the ranks─the hind, the rear, the bottom. Now, they have risen all the way to 596th!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_001<tab>Wettkampf wir uns mit ihnen liefern, aber wenn mit Erweiterung sie Erfolg haben, sie gewinnen. Nicht gut, gar nicht gut! Stören wir sie müssen.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_002<tab>And do you know how they have done this? Through─<gasp>─<var 1A 02 /var>effort<var 1A 01 /var>! Effort, and honest work! The utter gall─nerve, insolence, gall!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_002<tab>Idee ich hab! Tolle Idee! <var 2B ((<var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9348030502 /var>)) /var> zerstören wir müssen, dann Erweiterung sie nicht schaffen.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_003<tab>Even now, they dig, dig day and night at a vein that affords ore by the tonze─more ore than 789th sees in a year! This shameless ambition must be stopped! Ba Go will know what to do. Yes, yes, you must seek Ba Go. Ba Go always knows.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_003<tab>Mit Akolyth Ba Go du sprichst, ja? Rat er weiß! Wie man Dinge sprengt er weiß!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_004<tab>Even now, the 596th digs, digs day and night. Their industriousness makes me sick─ill, queasy, sick! But Ba Go will know what to do about this. Ba Go, he always knows.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_004<tab>Mit Akolyth Ba Go du sprichst, ja? Erklären lässt, wie <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9348030502 /var> du sprengen kannst!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_010<tab>Bo Zu would make big booms at the 596th Order Dig, send them plummeting down the ranks─diving, plunging, plummeting? Ba Go likes this plan. Yes, yes, likes it much.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_010<tab>Hohoho, <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9348030502 /var> du also sprengen willst, ja? Dabei dir ich helfen kann.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_011<tab>And you will help? Ba Go likes you too. Yes, Ba Go likes you so much he will lend you some of his beauties. And you will treat them gently─sweetly, kindly, gently.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_011<tab>Hier, Ziel selbst suchenden <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E896A020502 /var> du nimmst! Mit viel Liebe ich gemacht.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_012<tab>Ba Go will also give you smolder stones. Find something you want to go boom, place smolder stones close. Then step back. Yes, yes, stand clear. Release Ba Go's beauties, and savor the smell of chaos─relish, enjoy, savor.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_012<tab>Damit du kannst <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8969030502 /var> sprengen, wenn du als Zielmarkierung <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E8969030502 /var> aufstellst. Große Explosion das gibt! Buuum!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_013<tab>But Ba Go does not help you without a condition. No, no, after beauties go boom, you must enter the flames and come out with one of their cores.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_013<tab>Danach du untersuchst <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9352030502 /var>. Daraus <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F20AB7020502 /var> sicher auftauchen wird. Den du besiegst und erbeutest seine Essenz, ja?

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_014<tab>Ba Go needs all the cores he can get to build more beauties, make more things go boom. Yes, yes, make many, many booms! Heahehe! Heaahheahahaha!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_014<tab>Daraus ich züchte neue Bomber, kleine, liebe Bomber ... Also los, viel Erfolg!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_015<tab>Find something you want to go boom, and place smolder stone close. Then step back. Yes, yes, stand clear. Release Ba Go's beauties, and savor the smell of chaos─relish, enjoy, savor.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_015<tab>Auf <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8969030502 /var> du lässt <var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E896A020502 /var> fliegen und machst großes Buuum, ja?!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_016<tab>From the chaos, you will bring back a core for Ba Go. With it, Ba Go will build more beauties, make more things go boom. The more booms, the happier is Ba Go. And you want to keep Ba Go happy. Yes, yesss, you do! Heahehe! Heaahheahahaha!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_016<tab>Danach du untersuchst <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9352030502 /var>, besiegst <var 32 ((EventItem)) 06F61E896A020502 /var> und erbeutest seine Essenz! Alles klar, ja?

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_020<tab>Ba Go's beauties make beautiful, beautiful booms, yes? And you have present for Ba Go? Yes, yes, you do.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_020<tab>Hohoho, großes Buuum gemacht, ja? <var 2B ((<var 32 ((EventItem)) 03F61E896B020502 /var>)) /var> du hoffentlich nicht vergessen hast.

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_021<tab>Such a lovely, lovely core. Yes, Ba Go's next batch of beauties will be beautiful indeed, won't they? Yesss, yesss, they will!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_021<tab>Hohoho, sehr gut! Daraus ich kann züchten neue Lieblinge!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_022<tab>You're still here? Go, go, go back to Bo Zu, and leave me to my lovelies─my beauties, my darlings, my lovelies.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BAGO_000_022<tab>Ja, ja, liebe, neue Bomber ... Ein Fest das wird! Ah, gehen du kannst! Erfüllt deine Aufgabe ist!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_030<tab>The adventurer has done well, well has <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> done. Blasts and bursts were heard all the way from here. Yes, yes, they were heard!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_030<tab>Die Materialvorräte zerstört du hast, ja? Danke, danke! Die Erweiterung scheitern muss!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_031<tab>The 596th will learn that hard work is futile─pointless, fruitless, futile. Well will they learn the lesson─yes, the lesson we learned long ago.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_031<tab>Wer unseren Aufstieg behindert, gefährlich lebt! Skaetswys hat gesagt. Jaha!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_032<tab>Should they ever forget this lesson, you must return to play teacher─mentor, instructor, teacher. This you can do, yes? Yes, yes, Bo Zu can trust you.
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_BOZU_000_032<tab>Kalt gestellt 596. Orden nun ist! Uns nicht mehr in die Quere kommt!

source: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>There is a rush of heat from among the embers!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_POPMESSAGE_000_001<tab>Aus <var 32 ((EObj)) 03F61E9352020402 /var> fliegt ein Feind auf dich zu!

source:
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_040(-596th Order Scout-)You! Yes, you!
What are you doing there!?
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_040<tab>(-Kundschafter des 596. Ordens-)Wie? Was? Du da! Was du treibst?!

source:
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_041(-596th Order Scout-)We toiled long and hard for those!
Labored, troubled, toiled!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_041<tab>(-Kundschafter des 596. Ordens-)Unsere Materialvorräte du nicht anfasst mit deinen Drecksgriffeln!

source:
TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_042(-596th Order Scout-)Leave those alone! Yes, yes, do not touch!
Zo Ga will crush us, smash us, squash us!
target: TEXT_BANKOB106_01330_KOBOLD01330_000_042<tab>(-Kundschafter des 596. Ordens-)Ohne Materialvorräte wir niemals nicht erfüllen Förderquote! Finger weg!
